molecule

Class MolUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • molecule.MolUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MDToMol, MInfoIO, QChemToMol, VibUtil

    public class MolUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides driver routines for Molecule.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.0
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

      Constructs a MolUtil object with a given Molecule

      • copyAtoms

        public Molecule copyAtoms()
        Returns a copy of Molecule containing a list of atoms. Note that other data are not copied.
        Returns:
        Molecule

      • copyMolecule

        public Molecule copyMolecule(boolean atoms,
                             boolean edata,
                             boolean vdata,
                             int[] vibdomain)
        Returns a deep copy of Molecule
        Parameters:
        atoms - contains a list of atoms if true
        edata - contains electronic data if true
        vdata - contains vibrational data if true
        vibdomain - domain index (0,1,..,N-1). All domains are copied when null.
        Returns:
        A copy of Molecule
